featured.text: He succeeded in his endeavor and transformed the martial art into Brazil’s national sport.
George at first had difficulty swimming across the pool, but he finally succeeded on his fourth .
The author succeeded in losing weight.
There is no doubt that A.…can you succeed in achieving your goal.
People in this village… A.…unlikely that he would succeed.

definition.zh_def: 成功，達到預期的目標或結果。
definition.en_def: To achieve the desired aim or result.
definition.example: She worked hard to succeed in her career.
